--- title: Transforms keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Utilities for image transforms." ---

get_transforms[source]

get_transforms(size)

Return a tuple (train_tfms, val_tfms) containing transforms defined in albumentations for training and validation.

Transforms for training are :

  • RandomRotate90
  • Flip
  • Transpose
  • GridDistortion
  • RandomGamma
  • GaussianBlur

Both training and validation contain RandomCrop.
